p: The in silico data suggested that phytoconstituents possibly inhibited the key drug targets of L. donovani, which are important for their growth and survival. Further detailed studies are required to work out the exact mechanism of antileishmanial action of the C. fistula leaf extract in vitro as well as in vivo. Our findings may be helpful for designing of the treatment of leishmaniasis through the use of C. fistula alone or in combination with the existing antileishmanial drugs.
